Correctness_of_Analysis.description: Accuracy of the logical analysis provided by the system.

Completeness_of_Reasoning.description: The extent to which the reasoning trace is complete and covers all necessary logical steps.

Logical_Consistency.description: Consistency of the reasoning without contradictions or logical fallacies.

Explanation_Clarity.description: Clarity of the explanations provided in terms of understandability and transparency.

Efficiency_of_Steps.description: Efficiency in reaching the solution with a minimal number of logical steps.

Response_Timeliness.description: Quickness of the system in producing an answer.
